com.communote.server.core.tag.category

Class TagCategoryManagementImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.communote.server.core.tag.category.TagCategoryManagementBase
      • com.communote.server.core.tag.category.TagCategoryManagementImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TagCategoryManagement

    public class TagCategoryManagementImpl
extends TagCategoryManagementBase
    The Class TagCategoryManagementImpl offers methods to manage tag categories and categorized tags.

    Communote GmbH - http://www.communote.com/
